requires.name: canWalljump
requires.note: Inherent ability

requires.name: canTrickyWalljump
requires.note: Inherent ability

requires.name: canInsaneWalljump
requires.note: Extreme difficulty walljumps, around the level of HiJumpless writg.

requires.name: canMochtroidClip
requires.note: Using a frozen Mochtroid to clip through a one-tile-high wall.

requires.name: canPuyoClip
requires.note: Using a frozen Puyo to clip through a one-tile-high wall.

requires.name: canMochtroidClimb
requires.note: Using a Mochtroid's movement to climb upwards by continually freezing it higher up

requires.name: canSandMochtroidClimb
requires.note: Setting up a Mochtroid climb from a sand floor, where failure in a suitless environment can mean death

requires.name: canCrystalFlash
requires.note: FIXME: Needs ability for reader to count stuff, splitting on colon

requires.name: canDamageBoost
requires.note: Inherent ability

requires.name: canIframeSpikeJump
requires.note: Using i-frames to setup a jump from a spike floor. The i-frames are typically obtained by getting damaged by said spike floor

requires.name: canMachball
requires.note: Alias for canMockball

requires.name: canMockball
requires.note: Alias for canMachball

requires.name: canSuitlessMaridia
requires.note: Navigating Maridia without Gravity. This is not required for simple underwater platforming where missing a jump does not leave the player stuck somewhere, or for falling down a submerged room.

requires.name: canUseFrozenEnemies
requires.note: Can use Ice Beam to freeze enemies to use as platforms to reach higher areas

requires.name: canCrabClimb
requires.note: This is defined as repeatedly freezing a crab to climb up a wall, using no other support. This does not include the simple act of using a frozen crab as a stepping stone, even on a wall or in midair.

requires.name: canBeetomClip
requires.note: Using a frozen Beetom to perform a ceiling clip

requires.name: canWallCrawlerClip
requires.note: Using a frozen wall crawling enemy (such as a Zeela or Geemer) to perform a ceiling clip

requires.name: canSunkenDualWallClimb
requires.note: Using a series of rapid, consecutive wall jumps underwater, on two nearby walls, to climb upwards.

requires.name: canMaridiaTubeClip
requires.note: This means clipping into the Maridia tube from above by unmorphing.

requires.name: canHerdBabyTurtles
requires.note: This maneuver involves manipulating baby turtle movement to group them together in a corner, to clear the rest of the surface to charge a shinespark. Much easier with morph.

requires.name: canTunnelCrawl
requires.note: Moving along a 2-tile-high passage while standing up by repeatedly spin-jumping and then pressing down. Comes with softlock risks without Morph Ball.

requires.name: canCWJ
requires.note: Inherent ability

requires.name: canDamageBoostXRayScopeAccess
requires.note: Inherent ability

requires.name: canGrappleJump
requires.note: Using grapple to propel yourself upwards, then continuously morphing/unmorphing/jumping in midair to climb upwards

requires.name: canSnailClimb
requires.note: Piggybacking on top of a climbing snail to get up a wall

requires.name: canSporeSpawnSkip
requires.note: Super is for a Super Block

requires.name: canXRayClimb
requires.note: Using the X-Ray's forced standup trick to climb up through in-bound walls
